name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: Wuhan University of Technology dormitory has been sealed with iron doors

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The first thing you say when you wake up every day is to cheer yourself up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I'm not saying I got up, I'm saying someone is doing morning exercises

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The whole story of the Nanjing Tech University incident
On the evening of December 5, at Nanjing Tech University, students held a rally to express their dissatisfaction and demanded to return home voluntarily due to positive tests during the school closure.
At the scene, students shouted to go home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
During the process, a teacher went to negotiate.
The students shouted,
"Your power is given to you by the students, not by you. Serve the students!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: When they found out that the person in front of them was at the same level as the counselor, some students shouted, "You are here to take the blame." The counselor then said, "I am here to work."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The school proposed to hold a meeting the next day for students who had objections. The students called it a "Hongmen Banquet". The school then added that they would guarantee not to remember everyone's names, but the students still refused to compromise.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was suspected that some school staff wanted to take action, and some students shouted that if they did, they would be the second Foxconn.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police cars later appeared at the scene, but there was no chaos from beginning to end.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The sirens suddenly sounded at the scene, causing the students to sigh.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, students shouted for the leaders to step down.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the end, the school proposed to summarize all the demands, give them some time to resolve them tomorrow, and promised to protect the students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The contributor said that overall, the attitude of the school leaders on site was still very good. In the end, the crowd dispersed by collecting students' demands and convening students to voluntarily attend the meeting (almost 12 o'clock in the evening). The most disgusting thing was that there were a few middle-aged people in the crowd who were making trouble, trying to lead the public opinion and divide the student group, and even interrupted the leaders' speech, saying that everyone understood and they should disperse.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: We will provide further updates on how the school will ultimately propose a solution today and what will happen next.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A young Chinese man announced that he began a hunger strike outside Apple headquarters today.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It’s okay, you don’t need to comfort me. Through me, everyone can see more clearly what kind of monster Fang Zhouzi is, which is also very meaningful.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
When Mr. Fang first raised the question, I apologized and explained, but he blocked me in seconds.
I think from this point on, he no longer wanted to find out the truth, but was completely immersed in his own world.
In fact, he kept digging me up these days, just exposing his own problems, and I was not affected at all.
Anyway, everyone can see what happened next, so I won’t say more

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @LiYing_2015 I did choose my current name because I had the same name as you😃

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Sixlitchi @ALLFORTHESTAR @ATO8964 Always new

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I don't know if Mr. Fang really doesn't understand the sarcasm or if he does it on purpose. I'm inclined to the former.
But what is certain is that my QQ space has been locked for several years. The fact that you can see the content in my QQ space shows that Zhou Zhouzi is indeed good at information security.
There are more wonderful contents in my QQ space. I hope Mr. Zhou Zhouzi, as my smurf account these days, can help me move some more. It's great.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Just let him dig, no one should stop him
Can't you see it? If Zhou Zhouzi could prove that I was an international fraud group, he would have already thrown out the evidence to make it clear. Why did you go through my QQ space? Are you low?
Middle school students nowadays don't use this trick when they quarrel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Aaronzztt From what I know so far, most people’s follow-up reports are that they were arrested and made to write statements, and in some places their cell phones were confiscated for a month. I don’t know what happened to individual individuals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up of the incident:
Exam postponed, holiday at the end of the month, voluntary nucleic acid test, cancellation of reporting, voluntary return home.
At the same time, some relevant students were interviewed by the leaders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Aaronzztt added that the people arrested in Shanghai that night should be released within 24 hours and their cell phones confiscated for a month. Some people in other places have been called in to write statements for several hours in the past few days. I don't know more information.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @AuYKa1sZ2tAk8RH @RFA_Chinese @7758258e No, my private mailbox is cleared every day

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Thanks for the summary. I will also summarize what happened to Zhou Zhouzi's security fund and why he lost the case and had to pay more than 3 million yuan.
I am so angry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @BitRunX I have to say something really heartbreaking. When I had over 100,000 followers, his stats were not as good as mine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sorry, I'm doing some outdoor shooting today. I'll come back to sort out the manuscript in the evening.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Here are some suggestions for you
1. Don’t use the same account, name, and avatar on Twitter as you do on domestic social media
2. Don’t post the same content on domestic and foreign social media.
3. If you don’t want to lock your Twitter, separate your daily life from your politics
The above points are easier to find you than tracking your phone
4. My submissions are cleared every day, so I suggest you clear them after submitting your submissions to me

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@JiaMing48071338 Zhou Zhouzi said he read my tweets carefully
It proves one thing, that is, I have not blocked him so far

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ElonIchiro Of course I remember you, I mean I haven't seen you online for a long time, it turns out your account was banned

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today, residents in Cangzhou, Hebei Province gathered in front of a heating company because of heating problems.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@DonkeyTom2 I think the fundamental reason why the discussion about the White Paper Movement is getting less and less is that the matter has gradually died down.
Without new marches and protests, the discussion has naturally decreased.
I think now is the time for all the knowledgeable, insightful and influential people on Twitter to summarize their experiences and opinions for everyone.
And some people must focus all their attention on me, which is actually because they don’t care about this matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Are there any friends who can tell me what is the main reason why domestic college students want to postpone their postgraduate entrance examinations?
